Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the glycosyl hydrolase 22 family
Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Lysozymes have primarily a bacteriolytic Function
Sequence Information.Catalytic activity: Hydrolysis of (1->4)-beta-linkages between N-acetylmuramic acid and N-acetyl-D-glucosamine residues in a peptidoglycan and between N-acetyl-D-glucosamine residues in chitodextrins.

Literature.Title: Proteomic analysis of the venom from the scorpion Tityus stigmurus biochemical and physiological comparison with other Tityus species.
Literature.Reference: Comp Biochem Physiol C Toxicol Pharmacol. 2007 Jul-Aug;146(1-2)147-157.
Literature.Author: Batista C.V.F, Roman-Gonzalez S.A, Salas-Castillo S.P, Zamudio F.Z, Gomez-Lagunas F, Possani L.D.

Literature.Title: Proteomic analysis of the venom from the scorpion Tityus stigmurus: biochemical and physiological comparison with other Tityus species.
